meanings.definition: The act of grooming or trimming body hair, especially on a man.
meanings.sent1: Manscaping can help men feel more comfortable in their own skin.
meanings.sent2: I scheduled a manscaping appointment to tidy up before my beach vacation.
meanings.sent3: After a successful manscaping session, he felt like a new man.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to manscaping turned him into a grooming expert.
meanings.sent5: The barber recommended manscaping to keep a clean and polished look.

meanings.definition: The practice of maintaining a neat and tidy appearance by removing excess hair from the body.
meanings.sent1: Proper manscaping is essential for a well-groomed appearance.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated his attention to manscaping, which showed his dedication to hygiene.
meanings.sent3: His commitment to manscaping made him the envy of his friends.
meanings.sent4: Manscaping is like sculpting a work of art on your body.
meanings.sent5: Regular manscaping keeps you looking sharp and clean.
